body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Ronald Phillips and the customer's name is Heather Rivera.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Ronald Phillips, and I am with Phat Hogs Motorcycle Dealership. How can I help you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Ronald, I'm Heather Rivera. I'm feeling a bit overwhelmed.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand, Heather. Buying a motorcycle can be a big decision. May I ask what specifically is making you feel overwhelmed?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Honestly, I'm trying to decide which model is right for me, and I also need some financing options.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: That makes sense! We have several excellent models to choose from. Before we dive into details, could I get your phone number for follow-up?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's two zero three, four five six, seven eight nine zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you! And may I also have your email address to send you some options and information?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: It's heather.rivera at example dot com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great! I will send over some details this afternoon. Is there a particular model that has caught your eye so far?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I’m really interested in the Thunderhog model.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: The Thunderhog is an excellent choice! I will provide you with all the information you need. Thank you for your time today, Heather, and I look forward to helping you!
